name: Shanna Ragavan
headline: Technologist • Programmer • Creative Producer
summary: I’m a versatile technologist, creative and producer. I build interactive applications using Godot, C#, React and a spectrum of supporting technologies. As a Programmer, I translate design specifications into polished, functional prototypes.

apps.label: Pivt (React)
apps.description: An NBA calendar & matchup helper for fans—browse the season, check recent team performance, and see simple win-probability insights for upcoming games.

apps.label: SnappCount (React)
apps.description: A lightweight NFL schedule & matchup viewer. Browse games by week and see a transparent estimate of the home team’s win probability based on recent results.

games.label: kmusic
games.description: Start sequencing and explore fun, creative ways to build musical patterns, exercise your musical skills, and experiment with music production in a casual, intuitive way!

games.label: MEK vs MEK
games.description: A futuristic, turn-based strategy game where you command a squad of high-tech mechs on a dynamic, procedurally generated battlefield.
